# tf.keras.utils.normalize

``` python
tf.keras.utils.normalize(
    x,
    axis=-1,
    order=2
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/utils/np_utils.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/python/keras/utils/np_utils.py).

Normalizes a Numpy array.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`x`</b>: Numpy array to normalize.
* <b>`axis`</b>: axis along which to normalize.
* <b>`order`</b>: Normalization order (e.g. 2 for L2 norm).


#### Returns:

A normalized copy of the array.
